name: Rombo (EasyPixel)
description:
WARNING: All the music and sound effects are free so dont worry for any copyright strike! have fun playing :D

Rombo its a small cute character that he need to survive from the zombies!
you have called the helicopter to save you and you need to survive so what you have to do??? KILL ZOMBIES  AND SURVIVE until the helicopter meters get in to 0!

Controls:

W,S = move

Space = Shoot

R = Reload

Q = Place landmine.

Also you can comment your ideas and your hight score.
